data.title: Prof. Dr. Heiko Paulheim
data.text:
If you want to write your master's thesis under my supervision, here is some information for you:

As a first touch point, please fill this form, and e-mail it to Ms. Ezgi Yilmaz, together with a transcript of records.

This is your application for a master's thesis.

Just like when applying for a job, appartement, etc., your application is competing with others.

I do get a lot of requests, which usually exceed my supervision capacities. Thus, it is possible that I cannot consider your application.

Once I scanned your form, and given that I have free capacity, we'll schedule an appointment to discuss possible topics.

I do not have an openly available list, but most of my topics are centered around knowledge graphs.

Feel free to bring your own topic suggestions, as long as they fit into my research topics (see above).

Theses with companies are possible, but only under certain conditions:

The topic has to fit into my research topics (see above).

The thesis still has to be scientific (e.g., “apply method X from the literature to dataset Y” is not scientific).
